records() - Static method in class control.Controller
 
Restaurant - Class in bll
This class is the whole restaurant basically, containing the background data about its products.
Restaurant() - Constructor for class bll.Restaurant
the constructor for the Restaurant class it also initializes the gloabal variables
RestaurantSerializator - Class in dao
It saves the information from the Restaurant class in a file (named restaurant.ser) using serialization.
RestaurantSerializator() - Constructor for class dao.RestaurantSerializator
